lemma fixp_induct_dom_prog: fixes F :: "'c \<Rightarrow> 'c" and U :: "'c \<Rightarrow> 'b \<Rightarrow> ('heap, exception, 'result) prog" and C :: "('b \<Rightarrow> ('heap, exception, 'result) prog) \<Rightarrow> 'c" and P :: "'b \<Rightarrow> 'heap \<Rightarrow> 'heap \<Rightarrow> 'result \<Rightarrow> bool" assumes mono: "\<And>x. monotone (fun_ord dom_prog_ord) dom_prog_ord (\<lambda>f. U (F (C f)) x)" assumes eq: "f \<equiv> C (ccpo.fixp (fun_lub dom_prog_lub) (fun_ord dom_prog_ord) (\<lambda>f. U (F (C f))))" assumes inverse2: "\<And>f. U (C f) = f" assumes step: "\<And>f x h h' r. (\<And>x h h' r. h \<turnstile> (U f x) \<rightarrow>\<^sub>r r \<Longrightarrow> h \<turnstile> (U f x) \<rightarrow>\<^sub>h h' \<Longrightarrow> P x h h' r) \<Longrightarrow> h \<turnstile> (U (F f) x) \<rightarrow>\<^sub>r r \<Longrightarrow> h \<turnstile> (U (F f) x) \<rightarrow>\<^sub>h h' \<Longrightarrow> P x h h' r" assumes defined: "h \<turnstile> (U f x) \<rightarrow>\<^sub>r r" and "h \<turnstile> (U f x) \<rightarrow>\<^sub>h h'" shows "P x h h' r"
